required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interaction and the Safety of Inhaled CHF5259 and CHF6001
clinical_study.official_title: Open Label, Randomized, Repeated-dose, 3-way Crossover Study to Investigate Pharmacokinetic Interaction and the Safety of Inhaled CHF5259 and CHF6001 Administered in Healthy Subjects Via NEXThaler® Dry Powder Inhaler

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate systemic pharmacokinetics of CHF6001 following concomitant administration of CHF6001 and CHF5259, in comparison with the single components, administered in healthy subjects via a multi-dose reservoir NEXThaler® DPI.

detailed_description.textblock: This is randomised open label, 3-way cross-over study. Each 14-day treatment period is separated from the following one by a 21-day wash-out period. Subjects will reside at the clinic facilities during the 14 days treatment period.

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma CHF 5259 and CHF 6001 AUC 0-12,ss (area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to 12h post dose at steady on Day 14)
primary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 and Day 14 at pre-dose, within 15 minutes from dosing and at the following time points, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post morning dose. At Day 8, Day 12 and Day 13 at pre-dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pharmacokinetic interaction between CHF 5259 and CHF 6001

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma CHF 5259 and CHF 6001 Cmax,ss (maximum plasma concentration at steady state on Day 14)
primary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1 and Day 14 at pre-dose, within 15 minutes from dosing and at the following time points, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post morning dose. At Day 8, Day 12 and Day 13 at pre-dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pharmacokinetic interaction between CHF 5259 and CHF 6001

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma CHF 5259 and CHF 6001 and its metabolites (CHF 5956, CHF 6095) AUC0-12h, Cmax, tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1, Day 14 at the following time points: pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post-morning dose.
On Day 1, Day 14 at the following time points: pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post-morning dose.
On Day 1, Day 14: at pre-dose, 5, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 2 hours post-morning dose

On Day 1, Day 8 and on Day 14 at the following time points: pre-dose, 15 min, 30 min, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12 h post morning dose. From Day 2 to Day 13 at pre-morning dose only, On Day 15 (24 h after last dose), Day 16 (48 h after last dose) and at follow-up. (BP

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma CHF 5259 and CHF 6001 and its metabolites (CHF 5956, CHF 6095) Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1, Day 14 at the following time points: pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post-morning dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma CHF 5259 and CHF 6001 and its metabolites (CHF 5956, CHF 6095) tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: On Day 1, Day 14 at the following time points: pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 min and 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12 h post-morning dose.
